questions.question: An ecommerce company has deployed a machine learning model to recommend products to customers based on their browsing and purchase history. The company wants to ensure that the model's recommendations remain relevant and unbiased over time.  Which benefit of Amazon SageMaker Model Monitor would be most valuable in this scenario?
options: Early detection of data quality issues
Reduced operational overhead for data monitoring
questions.topic: 4.1 Monitor Model Performance and Data Quality
